sentences.sContent: And, though the gleams blind and dazzle, yet do they convey a hint of beauty and serenity greater than we have known or imagined.
sentences.sContent_eng: And, though the gleams blind and dazzle, yet do they convey a hint of beauty and serenity greater than we have known or imagined.
sentences.sCn: 虽然这光芒令人眼花缭乱，但它确实给予我们一种不曾经历和无法想象的美感和静谧的启示。

sentences.sContent: But strong flashes do more than just dazzle one's friends—they distort the quality of the picture.
sentences.sContent_eng: But strong flashes do more than just dazzle one's friends—they distort the quality of the picture.
sentences.sCn: 不过强闪光不仅仅是闪得被拍的朋友眼花缭乱——强闪光也会使照片失真变形。

words.tran: 头昏眼花地；恍惚地；眼花缭乱地

trans.tranOther: if a very bright light dazzles you, it stops you from seeing properly for a short time
